channel.title: The Chamberlain [BD Social] and The Magistrate [Unseen Social]
channel.description:
> **The Chamberlain** > **Blue Dragon Social** > > **Passives:** > **Loyal Aide:** If the starting Good King was executed during the day, you will be unable to use your day abilities. > > **Day:** > **Ballot Count (2 use):** See how many players voted for your target during the King election today. Cannot be used on the King. > **Electoral List (2 use):** See which players your target voted to be elected for King this game. Can be used on the dead. > > **Night:** > **Royal Ties (inf use):** Check if a player has Royal Blood, or had contact with a player that has Royal Blood. (contact = visited/ was visited by) > **Crown Ban (1 use):** Make your target unable to become King during an election. Won't affect a player with Royal Blood.
---
> **The Magistrate** > **Unseen Social** > > **Day:** > **Tally Up (2 use):** Learn how many votes were given to each player during the King election today. > **Electoral List (2 use):** See which players your target voted to be elected for King this game. Can be used on the dead. > > **Night:** > **Royal Bonds (inf use):** Check if a player has Royal Blood, or had contact with a player that has Royal Blood. You will learn their class if they do. (contact = visited/ was visited by) > **Royal Claim (1 use):** Give an Unseen player the Royal Blood passive. Can target self.

Oh no, your class got deleted!

item.title: The Chamberlain [BD Social] and The Magistrate [Unseen Social]
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
The Chamberlain
Blue Dragon Social

Passives:
Loyal Aide: If the starting Good King was executed during the day, you will be unable to use your day abilities.

Day:
Ballot Count (2 use): See how many players voted for your target during the King election today. Cannot be used on the King.
Electoral List (2 use): See which players your target voted to be elected for King this game. Can be used on the dead.

Night:
Royal Ties (inf use): Check if a player has Royal Blood, or had contact with a player that has Royal Blood. (contact = visited/ was visited by)
Crown Ban (1 use): Make your target unable to become King during an election. Wonâ€™t affect a player with Royal Blood.

The Magistrate
Unseen Social

Day:
Tally Up (2 use): Learn how many votes were given to each player during the King election today.
Electoral List (2 use): See which players your target voted to be elected for King this game. Can be used on the dead.

Night:
Royal Bonds (inf use): Check if a player has Royal Blood, or had contact with a player that has Royal Blood. You will learn their class if they do. (contact = visited/ was visited by)
Royal Claim (1 use): Give an Unseen player the Royal Blood passive. Can target self.

Read full topic
item.source: The Chamberlain [BD Social] and The Magistrate [Unseen Social]
